name: LD46 - Witching Hour
description:
Witches want your black cat for their satanic rituals.  Keep it alive!

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Space to dash in movement direction.

Survive until the timer at the bottom of the screen runs out to win the level.
Each level, witches become faster and learn new spells.

Beat all 6 levels to win the game.

You can use [ and ] to lower and decrease volume, respectively (it's not displayed in-game).

Made with Unity3D, Visual Studio Code, paint.net, bfxr, and beepbox.  Source Unity project available as a download below.

(I take no responsibility for any silliness or profanity in code comments)
